description:
Wada and Yamamoto talk about going to the dentist, stranger danger, new hairstyles, and look-alikes.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Caramel Ribbon / Betsu Houkou Dakedo / Kusaku wa Nai / Ippanteki Wada
